section.title: Form
section.para: Majisti forms are extended versions of Zend_Form. While Zend_Form simplifies form creation and handling in a web application, customizing the way it renders itself is quite a pain. Form overrides Zend_Form's setLayout function to make it accept an ILayout object as a parameter. The layout object then calls it's visit function (Visitor pattern [GoF]) on the form and it's possible subforms.
